snippet: The beleaguered Italian bank's shares were up 7.7 percent in midday trading on Tuesday, but that increase was of little comfort to shareholders who have witnessed a 61 percent slide in the stock price in the last week.
abstract: The beleaguered Italian bank's shares were up 7.7 percent in midday trading on Tuesday, but that increase was of little comfort to shareholders who have witnessed a 61 percent slide in the stock price in the last week.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: Investors buying into UniCredit shares have been taken for a wild ride over the past two days.

headline.main: UniCredit Shares Rise, but Do Little to Erase Huge Slide
